biotools.summary: Discovers which isoforms of a gene are expressed in a given sample together with their abundances, based on RNA-Seq read data. It takes an alignment file in SAM format as input, and it can also discover transcripts from several samples simultaneously, increasing statistical power.

bioschemas.name: flipflop
bioschemas.summary: Discovers which isoforms of a gene are expressed in a given sample together with their abundances, based on RNA-Seq read data. It takes an alignment file in SAM format as input, and it can also discover transcripts from several samples simultaneously, increasing statistical power.
